allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Haslametrics scraper: add User-Agent headers and correct XML attributes

- Added proper HTTP headers to avoid being blocked by server
- Fixed XML attribute names to match actual Haslametrics data structure
  \(mmo/mmd for momentum, inc for consistency, etc.\)
- Removed non-existent fields \(fg_pct, three_pct, pace, sos_rank, record_quality\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
